""[Technician, Service, Timeliness, Price] We love Expert Pools, LLC." "Disappeared, left with out communication with the pool in service mode." "Customer service is the best I have experienced in pool service companies."

My regular pool maintenance person accidentally broke a valve in my pool pump that causes the water to leak and as a result the inline chlorinator was not usable. Contacted my home warranty service and they sent Kris White from Expert Pool … More

"[Service, Technician] Kris was super friendly and knowledgeable. Diagnosed and fixed the issues quickly and efficiently. Answered my questions and explained and showed evidence of the issues and exactly how he corrected it. Had no issues rechecking when I experienced a problem after the initial visit.

Expert Pools has been my trusted pool service for over seven years.  I originally became a customer through a home warranty program.  While the warranty service declined sharply after 2021, Expert Pools has remained consistently excellent. … More
